description: Hacker News is a tech-focused news aggregator by Y Combinator, featuring user-submitted stories and discussions on startups, programming, and emerging trends

tools.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_FRONTPAGE
tools.description: Get the frontpage posts of Hacker News.

min_points.title: Min Points
min_points.description: Minimum points a post must have to be included in the response. It returns at most 50 posts.

tools.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_ITEM_WITH_ID
tools.description: Get a specific item from Hacker News using its ID. Limits response size to prevent context overflow.

item_id.title: Item Id
item_id.description: The ID of the item to retrieve from Hacker News.

max_depth.title: Max Depth
max_depth.description: Maximum depth of nested comments to include.

max_children.title: Max Children
max_children.description: Maximum number of direct children comments to include.

truncate_text.title: Truncate Text
truncate_text.description: Whether to truncate long text content.

tools.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_LATEST_POSTS
tools.description: Get the latest posts from Hacker News based on optional filters. Results can be limited using the size parameter.

size.title: Size
size.description: Limit the number of results returned. If not specified, returns all results from the page. Use 0 to return all results.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Filter on a specific tag. Available tags: story, comment, poll, pollopt, show_hn, ask_hn, front_page, author_<USERNAME>, story_<ID>.

tools.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_TODAYS_POSTS
tools.description: Get today's posts from Hacker News.

min_points.title: Min Points
min_points.description: Minimum points a post must have to be included in the response. It returns at most 1000 posts.

tools.name: HACKERNEWS_GET_USER
tools.description: Get a specific user from Hacker News using their username.

username.title: Username
username.description: The username of the Hacker News user to retrieve.

tools.name: HACKERNEWS_SEARCH_POSTS
tools.description: Get relevant posts from Hacker News based on a full-text query and optional filters. Results can be limited using the size parameter.

size.title: Size
size.description: Limit the number of results returned. If not specified, returns all results from the page. Use 0 to return all results.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Filter on a specific tag. Available tags: story, comment, poll, pollopt, show_hn, ask_hn, front_page, author_<USERNAME>, story_<ID>.

query.title: Query
query.description: Full-text query to filter the posts.
